| HistoryText             = Project: Homegrown is the Weapon VII of the [[Weapon Plus (Earth-616)|Weapon Plus]] program. They experimented on human soldiers during the [[Vietnam War]]. Some of the known participants who died in Project: Homegrown included Andrew Perlmutter, Michael Labash, John Walsh, James MacPherson and fourteen other unknown recruits. The only known successful subject of Project: Homegrown was [[Frank Simpson (Earth-616)|Sgt. Frank Simpson]] codenamed "Nuke", who had armored implants under his epidermis and was given [[Adrenaline Pills]] to alter and control his mood. Logan, who would later become one of Weapon Plus' victims, kidnapped [[Frank Simpson (Earth-616)|Nuke]] as a child, who oversaw his conditioning.{{r|Daredevil Vol 1 233}}{{r|Wolverine: Origins Vol 1 3|5}}

===Power Elite===
[[Ezekiel Stane (Earth-616)|Zeke Stane]] on behalf of the [[Power Elite (Earth-616)|Power Elite]] created an army of [[Nuke Clones (Earth-616)|Nuke Clones]].{{r|Captain America Vol 9 1}}
